statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id = 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE from_address = 'Alice' AND to_address = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id IN (100, 200, 300) ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id = 10 AND from_address = 'Alice' ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT distinct from_address FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY from_address ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_hash, block_number, miner_address FROM block_metadata WHERE num_transactions < 5 ORDER BY block_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT to_address, sum(amount) as total_amount FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY to_address HAVING sum(amount) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_hash, miner_address, num_transactions FROM block_metadata WHERE block_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE from_address = '0x123456789' AND to_address = '0x987654321';
SELECT block_hash, block_number, block_timestamp FROM block_metadata ORDER BY block_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY block_height DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_hash, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT bt.transaction_id, tm.transaction_type, tm.gas_fee, tm.block_time FROM blockchain_transactions bt JOIN transaction_metadata tm ON bt.transaction_id = tm.transaction_id;
SELECT tl.log_id, tl.log_type, tl.log_description, tm.transaction_type FROM transaction_logs tl JOIN transaction_metadata tm ON tl.transaction_id = tm.transaction_id ORDER BY tl.log_time ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_height = 5000;
SELECT transaction_hash, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND receiver_address LIKE '%ABC%';
SELECT transaction_type, gas_fee FROM transaction_metadata WHERE block_time > '2022-02-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY gas_fee DESC;
SELECT log_type, log_description FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_time < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM block_info WHERE block_id = 1000;
SELECT transaction_hash, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT wallet_address, owner_name FROM wallet_addresses ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, miner_address, transaction_count FROM block_info WHERE block_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id = 1000;
SELECT b.block_id, b.block_date, w.owner_name FROM block_info b INNER JOIN wallet_addresses w ON b.miner_address = w.wallet_address;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, td.transaction_fee FROM transaction_details td INNER JOIN blockchain_transactions t ON td.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, recipient_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_hash, block_timestamp FROM blocks WHERE block_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, detail_key, detail_value FROM transactions_details WHERE detail_key LIKE '%address%';
SELECT history_id, action_type, history_timestamp FROM transaction_history ORDER BY history_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, block_timestamp FROM blocks WHERE block_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123abc' AND amount < 500.00;
SELECT detail_key, detail_value FROM transactions_details WHERE detail_key LIKE '%status%' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, block_id, action_type, history_timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE block_id = 100 ORDER BY history_timestamp ASC;
